Articles.Content:
Hello. Been playing this game for about a month now. and have been lurking around on the forum for about the same amount of time. And its pretty frickin good. I got a few packs of mod parts and and managed to get a few pretty circular orbits and a few other feats such as 3.6 Million Km and landing at the Launch facility after a night of orbits and such.

Anyways keep up the good work everyone. and i'm looking forward to the future updates.

Thanks

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
